Tooltip: This activity returns all Jobs from a specific folder that are not marked Successful or Faulted.

Arguments.Name: in_Filter
Arguments.Tooltip: OData filter string used as a query parameter. See OData 4 APIs for reference on how to build a filter. Automatically appends "(State in ('Successful','Faulted') eq false)" to filter string.

Arguments.Name: out_Jobs
Arguments.Tooltip: Collection of Jobs returned by API call as array of JobDto.

Arguments.Name: in_StartTime
Arguments.Tooltip: Filters jobs by start date and time. Appended to filter.
